Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, south of the Chug-A-Lug Pub.
Room.LongDescription: The Chug-A-Lug Pub is a pretty filthy night club where various people of any class go to have a fairly good time, depending on what one's definition of a good time is. The entrance to the Pub is located on the west side of the building off of Melbourne Avenue. On the south side of the street is the Generic Clerical Supply shop where various articles of religion may be purchased.
